__e: Classification: Equality - Art. 24 Children’s rights - Solidarity - Art. 31 Working conditions: healthy - Working conditions: safe - Working conditions: dignified - Rest period - Paid leave
My brother Sol, the plumber, he makes twice as much money as me and gets three weeks vacation, too.
He thinks we lost the war because of paid holidays.
So I'll take some time off, come here.
He did, but I've got some leave coming and I've decided to take it.
And yes for my part, I try to save both my days off and my money to go to the sun in February.
You mean, you don't get time off even if you're sick?
It's spring break. We came to visit.
You know the terms I agreed to keep you boys on the Enterprise when your parents went on sabbatical?
Mid Week (From Monday to Friday excluding school holidays)
Tuesdays - Wednesdays : closed except during school holidays
With the beginning of the new year, many of us are already planning their annual vacation in the sunny south.
Closing days: Mondays and Tuesdays. Annual holiday: 1 week in March and 3 weeks in Octobre.
Annual holidays: 2 weeks in March, 2 weeks in September and one week at Christmas.
* Closed on Sundays and during long weekends
Please take note that our office will be closed for the following public holidays:
Our rates are per night. Rates may vary during Christmas holiday, spring break, and statutory holidays. Please contact us for more information.
